Articles.Content:
Not a space craft but still a lot of fun.

Because the ship is oddly shaped you\'ll only want to use a small amount of available thrust in order to keep it level because of this it is VERY slow, like 15 m/s slow. It likes to hang around 7200 m.

Currently I\'m attempting a ocean crossing in it but the range is quite limited.

It uses the C7 pack, BACE pack, the Kosmos pack and the Blimp addon
Sabactus, That\'s a really neat design,,I\'ve just started messing about with the blimp but never thought of using them Vertically, Great idea
Whats really fun is that having all the engines on rotators makes it so that I can use the bottom one as a power rudder which makes this thing quite nimble.
The latest in experemental airship designs. I give you the Double D

Everybody needs a blimp, cause blimps are pretty pimp...

I say that everytime someone mentions an airship of any kind.
I LOOoove Double D\'s..I\'ll bet she\'s a bit TOP heavy.

I LOOoove Double D\'s..I\'ll bet she\'s a bit TOP heavy.

Actually she handles like a dream.

Looks like we now have anouther type of thing to build (in decending order from the being of KSP : Rockets, Spaceplanes, Satelites, ships, submarines, cars, propeller powered aircraft, Airships, (whats next?)). Well done on you airships, they look great, especally the Double D.
Can you provide a link to the Blimp addon\'s thread? I cannot find it for the life of me.
Here you go.

Well I got another one on the way. Right now it is just in the prototype phase be I couldn\'t wait to share it. I\'ve already named this line. I give you the Nostalgia for Infinity (+10 internets if you can name the book reference)

Here is the fully functional ship.

It is actually more fuel efficient than the Double D and I\'ve equipped it with pontoons, C7 cylindrical structural peice, for water landing rather than the struts I now have on Double D
what is NP.Heavystrut the blimps of your i downloaded say that part is missing :o
From the Nova Punch pack. Its the black cross members you see.
pretty cool
thanks buy the way your ship are cool
can you tell me everything you used please on all blimps please it\'s still yelling at me about missing parts ???
what is a GQDP.depthEqualizer.down
gabes sub marine mod
SOME ONE TELL ME EVERY PART I NEED FOR ALL THE BLIMPS ON THIS POST
Ill look after dinner. I\'ve been playing EVE online and haven\'t been checking forum posts.
